PotentiometerGraphTool - Class in model.tools
PotentiometerGraphTool is used to represent a potentiometer instance on a Graph2D.
PotentiometerGraphTool(double, double) - Constructor for class model.tools.PotentiometerGraphTool
Creates a new potentiometer at the specified location.
PotentiometerView - Class in view.elements
The PotentiometerView class is an ElementView responsible for drawing all PotentiometerGraphTools on a graph using a provided Graphics object.
PotentiometerView(Graph2D, int) - Constructor for class view.elements.PotentiometerView
Constructs a new PotentiometerView using the provided graph and assigns it the passed sortOrder.
printElements() - Method in class model.Graph2D
Prints the elements of this graph in a readable format.
ProgramAssets - Class in assets
The ProgramAssets class is responsible for loading all image assets built into the program.
ProgramController - Class in controller
ProgramController serves as a link between the model and view objects for the Charge Simulation program.
ProgramController(int, int) - Constructor for class controller.ProgramController
Constructs a new ProgramController with an empty graph using the specified width and height arguments.
ProgramView - Class in view
The ProgramView class is responsible for managing all view components of the program.
ProgramView() - Constructor for class view.ProgramView
Creates a new ProgramView object.
